sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
An idyll on the peace.
10 p.
printed for R. Parker, at the Unicorn under the piazza of the Royal Exchange in Cornhil; Peter Buck, at the sign of the Temple at the middle-Temple-Gate in Fleetstreet; and are to be sold by R. Baldwin in VVarwick lane, London : 1697.
Running title: An idyll on the peace. Signatures: A-B⁴ C2.
=======
